price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga ubwire abantu bose uti: “Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, Yantegetse jewe hamwe n’abankurikiye kuyiyegereza mu vyo dukora vyose tunayisenga ari Imwe Rudende, tweza n’ivyo tugira vyose ku bwayo;
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

meta.transliteration: qul innī umir'tu an aʿbuda al-laha mukh'liṣan lahu al-dīna
